programme.title: Santa & Me
programme.desc: A mean and spoiled 13-year-old girl is turned into a "monster" by Santa. She must get a real present from a real friend by Christmas or she'll stay a monster.

programme.title: Jungle All the Way: A Jungle Book Christmas
The 12 Dogs of Christmas
programme.desc: A widowed and out of work father reluctantly sends his daughter to stay with her aunt in a town that has outlawed dogs. She now has to get to the bottom of what is happening to all the dogs and at the same time charm the mayor with a pageant.

programme.title: A Doggone Christmas
programme.desc: Murphy, an amazing pup with special telepathic abilities, escapes a government lockdown and runs straight into the loving arms of two young brothers. The government is now looking for their secret weapon, will they get him back?

programme.title: Eddie's Wonderland
programme.desc: Eddie loves to celebrate the holidays and wants to include everyone! Eddie's Wonderland is full of holiday shows that everyone can enjoy!

programme.title: Operation Christmas List
programme.desc: 12-year-old Barney has a plan to beat the Christmas rush and buy the entire stock of the most sought after gift, the Crabby Mousie doll, which he can then barter for his own Christmas gift, but unfortunately, things don't go exactly as planned!
